text: Karl Ivar Martinsen (8 December 1920 – 24 September 2018) was a Norwegian speed skater. He competed in the 1500 m event at the 1948 and 1952 Olympics and finished 16th and 8th. He won bronze medals at the 1952 world and 1953 European allround championships.Ivar Martinsen . sports-reference.com He was born in Løten, Norway. Martinsen died in Oslo, Norway from complications of pneumonia on 24 September 2018, aged 97.Tidligere skøyteløper Ivar Martinsen er død ==References== ==Other websites== Category:1920 births Category:2018 deaths Category:Deaths from pneumonia Category:Olympians for Norway
title: Ivar Martinsen
